name: User Flow
description:
Ryan Singer’s UI Flow is a simple and fast way to sketch a flow and share it with stakeholders:

Above the bar is what the user sees, below the bar is what they do.

An arrow connects the user’s action to a new screen with yet another action.

The dotted line separates alternate actions, and appears above each additional action

When there are multiple actions, the arrows point from an action to a new screen.

Screens where the possible actions are uninteresting or out of scope simply have no bar below them
